a37d19eb45d76cd6ab4e2c8fa9fc156bf7be97db.commit.message:
Fix ExceptionUtils#getStackFrame(String) javadoc (closes #274)

ExceptionUtils#getStackFrame(String)'s javadoc contains a broken
reference to SystemUtils#LINE_SEPARATOR (as the class name is not
fully qualified, and there's no import of
org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils).

This patch fixes the broken reference by replacing it it with a
reference to System#lineSeparator(), which the method actually uses.
a37d19eb45d76cd6ab4e2c8fa9fc156bf7be97db.commit.author.name: Allon Mureinik

5ffb662019501692112fbebf15d92d01c17f1322.commit.message: Make sure deprecated CharEncoding constants are equal to the values defined in StandardCharsets
5ffb662019501692112fbebf15d92d01c17f1322.commit.author.name: Benedikt Ritter
